Class ec.plubar.jEditableCapabilityGroup 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.plubar.jEditableCapabilityGroup
public class jEditableCapabilityGroup
extends Object
implements jCapabilityGroup, Serializable, RtStateUpgradeable
An editable capability group implements the jCapabilityGroup interface, but also allows adding of capabilities.

It has a method which returns an read-only jCapabilityGroup reference, which does not allow updating

Version:
1.0
Author:
Trevor Morris, Arturo Bejar

MAX_ENTRIES
Number of entries allocated by hasthable

Hashtable of capabilities

addCapabilityOfType 
 public void addCapabilityOfType(Object capability,
                                 String typeName)
Add a capability to the group, under the named type..

Parameters:
capability - The capability to add
typeName - The type name of the type which can be used to retrieve this capability from the table ('capability' must be an instance of the type).

 public void makeAndAddCapabilityOfType(EObject capability,
                                        String typeName)
Add a capability to the group, under the named type.

Parameters:
capability - The capability to add
typeName - The type name of the type which can be used to retreive this capability from the table ('capability' must be an instance of the type).
capabilityOfType 
 public Object capabilityOfType(String typeName)
Get the capability of the given type, where type is specified by a type name

Parameters:
typeName - Name of a Java interface or class, used in capability lookup.
Returns:
capability of given type, or null if the group doesn't contain a capability of the given type
asCapabilityGroup 
 public jCapabilityGroup asCapabilityGroup()
Return 'this' table "stonecast" to jCapabilityGroup - i.e. a read-only version of ourselves.
